Hi everyone,

I know that the tactic show can be used for rewrite the goal into a new one if the new goal is rfl to the original goal. Can I do the same thing for one of the assumptions? I know that

-- h : xxx
rw [show xxx = yyy by rfl] at h

can do this, but is there a more convenient way of doing this? Somtimes xxx is just too lengthy. For example, is it possible to just write some_tactic yyy at h? Thank you!
Jiang Jiedong has marked this topic as resolved.
